lines.text: I can tell you something about this place. The boys around here call it "The Black Lagoon"; a paradise. Only they say nobody has ever come back to prove it.
What kind of fishing is that? Who eats rocks?
I eat rocks, in a manner of speaking. I crush and look inside them and they tell me things.
We didn't come here to fight monsters, we're not equipped for it.
And I thought the Mississippi was something.
It is impossible. But I, Lucas, will do it.
There are many strange legends in the Amazon. Even I, Lucas, have heard the legend of a man-fish.
